group.label: Merchant Shipping Details
group.comment: The following properties apply to merchant listing experiences.

field.label: Destination shipping countries configuration
field.comment:
Handling time - the typical delay in days between the receipt of the order and the goods leaving the warehouse.

Badge - The typical delay in days between when the order has been sent for delivery and when the goods reach the final customer.

Both fields allow numeric values only. You can set single number or range. Use dash ("-") to set the range.
